name: Water Rich Wonderland
title: Lowest Water Stress Levels
description: In 2021, Congo had one of the lowest water stress levels globally, with freshwater withdrawals accounting for only 2.74% of its available resources. This indicates a sustainable use of its abundant water resources.

name: Surgical Scarcity
title: Limited Surgical Procedures
description: As of 2018, Congo performed only 49 surgical procedures per 100,000 people, highlighting a significant gap in healthcare services compared to global standards.

name: Stable Yet Vulnerable
title: Minimal New Displacements Due to Conflict
description: In 2019, Congo reported only 2 new cases of internal displacement due to conflict and violence, showcasing a relatively stable environment amidst regional challenges.

name: Trade Tensions
title: Moderate Binding Coverage on Primary Products
description: In 2015, Congo had a binding coverage of 52.18% on primary products, indicating moderate trade restrictions that could impact economic growth.
